page.title: 10 ATTITUDES.
page.content: A pair of 15 year old boys gave their opinions of young peoples attitudes towards adults and people in a position of power. POLITICIANS:Most youths ignore politics and its leaders because they are not so directly affected by them. POLICE:Generally hated by the younger generation because they believe they are being picked on and restricted. TEACHERS:Again unliked by younger people but many of the younger teachers are accepted because of their age. OTHER RACES:There is a very high tension between different races today. Many people donate to foreign charity but many people hate other races because they feel a sense of loyalty to their country and a sense of invasion.
